title: Proof the Left Doesn’t Care About Climate Change | 7/7/22
description:
People protesting climate change were blocking traffic on a major freeway in D.C., and a man on parole trying to get to work was arrested. Pat and Stu go over the pros and cons of various energy sources. Pat and Stu dig through the newest IPCC report on climate change. More details have come out about the Uvalde atrocity, which further hurts the reputation of the Uvalde police. Pat and Stu discuss some of the atrocities this year and whether they should qualify as “mass shootings.” WNBA player Brittney Griner pleaded guilty to drug charges in Russia, facing up to 10 years in prison. The Democratic Party is in desperate search for a new leader. Will Gavin Newsom fill the gap? The critical importance of the 2022 midterms cannot be overstated.
